ship.name: Perfume Yuda
ship.description: A ship pulled by sea serpents (Yuda) that can traverse the Calm Belt

jollyRoger.description: A skull with long hair and a crown, with snake motifs

goals.goal: Protect Amazon Lily and maintain its isolation

keyMoments.title: Introduction of the Kuja Tribe
keyMoments.description: The Kuja tribe is introduced as an all-female warrior society living on Amazon Lily in the Calm Belt, completely isolated from the outside world.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of the Kuja tribe and their unique culture, establishing them as a significant group in the One Piece world.

keyMoments.title: Kuja Warriors Discover Luffy
keyMoments.description: Three Kuja warriors discover an unconscious person (Luffy) covered in parasitic mushrooms and show compassion by bringing him to their village for treatment.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the Kuja's compassionate nature despite their fearsome reputation, and sets up the coming conflict when Luffy's gender is revealed.

reputation.description: Known as powerful female warriors from the Calm Belt

trivia.fact: The Kuja tribe is unique in that all its members are female, and they have developed a complete society without any male presence.
The Kuja are able to traverse the Calm Belt using sea serpents called Yuda to pull their ships, making them one of the few groups capable of this feat.
The name 'Kuja' (九蛇) literally means 'Nine Snakes' in Japanese, reflecting the snake motifs prevalent in their culture.
